sentences.en: a splendid feast of turkey with all the trimmings
sentences.cn: 备有各种配料的丰盛火鸡大餐

sentences.en: a wedding feast
sentences.cn: 婚筵

sentences.en: At the feast there was food and drink in abundance.
sentences.cn: 宴会上有丰富的饮食.

sentences.en: Chicago provides a feast for the ears of any music lover.
sentences.cn: 《芝加哥》将给所有音乐爱好者献上一场听觉的盛宴。

sentences.en: Host and guests frequently raised their glasses during the feast.
sentences.cn: 席间宾主频频举杯.

sentences.en: Lunch was a feast of meat and vegetables, cheese, yoghurt and fruit, with unlimited wine.
sentences.cn: 午餐是一场盛宴，有肉、蔬菜、奶酪、酸奶和水果，以及不限量的葡萄酒。

sentences.en: Only a few feet away, their captors feasted in the castle's banqueting hall.
sentences.cn: 仅仅几英尺外，俘获他们的人在城堡的宴会厅里大吃大喝。

sentences.en: Thank you for that lovely meal; it was a veritable feast!
sentences.cn: 谢谢你那顿美餐, 真是一顿名副其实的盛宴!

sentences.en: The bridegroom has given a wedding feast with twenty tables.
sentences.cn: 男方摆了20桌酒席.

sentences.en: The children had a midnight feast in their tents.
sentences.cn: 孩子们半夜在帐篷里饱餐了一顿.

sentences.en: the feast day of St. Francis
sentences.cn: 圣方济各纪念日

sentences.en: the feast of Christmas
sentences.cn: 圣诞佳节

sentences.en: The feast was served by his mother and sisters.
sentences.cn: 这顿美餐是他母亲和他的姐妹们准备的。

sentences.en: The fruit was often served at wedding feasts.
sentences.cn: 婚宴上常有水果供应。

sentences.en: The Jewish feast of Passover began last night.
sentences.cn: 犹太人的宗教节日逾越节昨晚开始了。

sentences.en: The king promised to hold a great feast for all his people.
sentences.cn: 国王允诺为全体子民举行盛宴。

sentences.en: They feasted well into the afternoon on mutton and corn stew.
sentences.cn: 他们尽情享用玉米炖羊肉，一直吃到下午。

sentences.en: They had a midnight feast in their tent.
sentences.cn: 他们在帐篷里举行了一次午夜宴会.

sentences.en: This new series promises a feast of special effects and set designs.
sentences.cn: 这部新的系列剧将会是一场特效和舞美的盛宴。

sentences.en: We feasted on chicken and roast potatoes.
sentences.cn: 我们饱餐了一顿鸡肉和烤土豆。

sentences.en: We feasted our eyes on the paintings.
sentences.cn: 这些画让我们大饱眼福

sentences.en: Well we did have a midnight feast, me and my sister.
sentences.cn: 我和姐姐的确在半夜大吃了一顿。

sentences.en: Wow! Come and feast your eyes on this birthday cake!
sentences.cn: 哇! 快来欣赏一下这个生日蛋糕!

sentences.en: You shouldn't have troubled yourself to prepare such a feast!
sentences.cn: 你不该准备这样丰盛的饭菜,这样太麻烦你了.

phrases.tran_cn: 大饱眼福：视觉上得到快乐和满足
n. 节日；斋日；宗教节日
尽情欣赏；尽情享受；大吃大喝
津津有味地看，尽情欣赏

trans.tran_en: a large meal where a lot of people celebrate a special occasion
A feast is a large and special meal
If you feast, you take part in a feast

trans.tran_cn: 尽情地吃， 宴饮； 参加宴会
trans.tran_en: If you feast on a particular food, you eat a large amount of it with great enjoyment
